overview: This gripping drama brings to life the true rogue-shark story that inspired Jaws. In 1916, the New Jersey shore became a feeding ground as five people were attacked in 12 days, triggering a nationwide panic. It was the first multiple shark attack in American history, and the reason we fear sharks to this day.
tagline: There's a true story behind the movie Jaws - a bloody summer that triggered a century of panic.
title: Blood in the Water
